title: Fire tablet deals offer big savings on already cheap devices this week
author: tabitha-baker
summary: The cheapest tablets just got cheaper
article: Amazon Fire tablet deals offer the chance to grab an already-cheap tablet at an even lower price, and while this week those discounts aren't as steep as they were towards the end of 2020, there are certainly some excellent savings to be made.

In some cases these Fire tablet deals are only a few dollars off those record lows and still well worth their discounts. That means you'll find price cuts on everything from the super cheap Fire 7 (now down to $39.99, was $49.99), all the way through to latest Amazon Fire HD 10 (now $94.99, was $149.99).

However, the happy medium for most is the Amazon Fire HD 8. With 32GB of storage, an 8-inch display, and a 12 hour battery life you're certainly getting plenty of value here - in a tablet perfectly designed for cheap content streaming, web browsing and Kindle reading. Right now, this $25 discount brings the final price to $64.99.
You'll find all of these Amazon Fire tablet deals just below, with more offers from around the web further down the page as well.

Of course, there's plenty of cheap Android tablets out there. While these Amazon Fire tablet sales might be limited to Amazon's own Fire OS, you'll find plenty more discounts on Samsung Galaxy tablet deals as well. The Samsung Galaxy Tab A price is in competing range of Amazon's own cheap offerings, and brings plenty more apps to the party, for example.
Or, if you're looking to put up a little more cash you'll also find a range of cheap iPad deals offering price cuts this week as well.
